POST.TITLE: Textasic is Fantastic
POST.BODY: With Textasic one can create, edit and manage files remotely through SFTP, terminal, or varius cloud drives.

POST.TITLE: Working New Project
POST.BODY: The years are slipping by. Working on a site for a close friend will be back to up date this and my resume in short order.

POST.TITLE: Favorite Quote
POST.BODY: Favorite Quote: "Don't let guy holding the broom decide how many elephants should be in the parade."
